name: RIW Software Technology AB
tag_list: sweden, helpdesk, support, customer-support, servicedesk, regitwise, it-support
overview:
RIW Software is specialists in ServiceDesk/HelpDesk, Asset management, Network inventory and theft protection.

We help you get control over your Inventory, your Hardware and Software in the network. RIW Software develops and markets systems for small, medium and large businesses and organizations. Contact us and get references that suits your organization. We have over 15 years experience in our industry.

RIW Software provides RegitWise ServiceDesk/HelpDesk - Web based issue tracking system that follows the ITIL standard for the service desk. RegitWise ServiceDesk/HelpDesk is highly customizable, user friendly, easy to implement help desk software. RegitWise ServiceDesk/HelpDesk supports multiple languages. It is very easy to set up and configure, you are up and running in minutes.
